summary: "Mars Attacks!" is a 1996 sci-fi comedy film directed by Tim Burton. It's about an alien invasion from Mars, with a star-studded cast including Jack Nicholson and Glenn Close. The movie was based on a trading card series and had a big budget of $80 million. Despite this, it only made $101.4 million at the box office and got mixed reviews. The special effects were done by Industrial Light & Magic. Although it didn't do well in theaters, it was nominated for a Hugo Award and several Saturn Awards.
title: Mars Attacks!
